roupas.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) ?category WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE,pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?item rdfs:label ?item_label} VALUES ?instancia {wd:Q11460 wd:Q198763 wd:Q17152912 wd:Q1146363 wd:Q212989 wd:Q22676 wd:Q161928 wd:Q43663} ?item wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470; wdt:P18 ?imagem_; wdt:P31 ?instancia; schema:dateModified ?date_modified. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item), 32 ) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') AS ?imagem) OPTIONAL{?category_ schema:about ?item; schema:name ?category; schema:isPartOf <https://commons.wikimedia.org/>.} } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ?category ORDER BY (?date_modified)

BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item), 32 ) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') AS ?imagem) OPTIONAL{?category_ schema:about ?item; schema:name ?category; schema:isPartOf <https://commons.wikimedia.org/>.} } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ?category ORDER BY (?date_modified)

miscelânea.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) ?category WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE,pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?item rdfs:label ?item_label} VALUES ?instancia {wd:Q47107 wd:Q1365218 wd:Q21235101 wd:Q201097 wd:Q471898 wd:Q19603939 wd:Q193395 wd:Q35158 wd:Q6498959 wd:Q97949996 wd:Q16406 wd:Q1757562} ?item wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470; wdt:P18 ?imagem_; wdt:P31 ?instancia; schema:dateModified ?date_modified. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item), 32 ) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') AS ?imagem) OPTIONAL{?category_ schema:about ?item; schema:name ?category; schema:isPartOf <https://commons.wikimedia.org/>.} } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ?category ORDER BY (?date_modified)

Metadados.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?obra ?obra_label ?obra_descr ?category ?numero_de_inventario (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(?instancia_qid, '@', ?instancia_label); SEPARATOR = ';') AS ?instancia) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(?criador_qid, '@', ?criador_label); SEPARATOR = ';') AS ?criador) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(?material_qid, '@', ?material_label); SEPARATOR = ';') AS ?material) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(?encomendador_qid, '@', ?encomendador_label); SEPARATOR = ';') AS ?encomendador) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(?metodo_qid, '@', ?metodo_label); SEPARATOR = ';') AS ?metodo) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(?colecao_qid, '@', ?colecao_label); SEPARATOR = ';') AS ?colecao) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(STR(?altura_), '@', STR(?unit_a)); SEPARATOR = ';') AS ?altura) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(STR(?largura_), '@', STR(?unit_l)); SEPARATOR = ';') AS ?largura) (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) (SAMPLE(?audio) AS ?audio) (SAMPLE(?data) AS ?data) WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE,pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?instancia_ rdfs:label ?instancia_label. ?criador_ rdfs:label ?criador_label. ?obra rdfs:label ?obra_label; schema:description ?obra_descr. ?material_ rdfs:label ?material_label. ?encomendador_ rdfs:label ?encomendador_label. ?metodo_ rdfs:label ?metodo_label. ?colecao_ rdfs:label ?colecao_label. ?retrata_ rdfs:label ?retrata_label. } BIND(wd:QIDDAOBRA AS ?obra) OPTIONAL { ?obra wdt:P18 ?imagem_. } BIND(IF(BOUND(?imagem_), REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', ''), 'Calaamad suaal.png') AS ?imagem) OPTIONAL { ?obra wdt:P989 ?audio_. BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?audio_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') AS ?audio) } OPTIONAL { ?obra wdt:P31 ?instancia_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?instancia_), 32 ) AS ?instancia_qid) } OPTIONAL { ?obra wdt:P170 ?criador_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?criador_), 32 ) AS ?criador_qid) } OPTIONAL { ?obra wdt:P571 ?data_; (p:P571/psv:P571) ?data_aux. ?data_aux wikibase:timeValue ?data_value; wikibase:timePrecision ?data_precision. BIND(CONCAT(STR(YEAR(?data_value)), '-', STR(MONTH(?data_value)), '-', STR(DAY(?data_value)), '-', STR(?data_precision)) AS ?data) } OPTIONAL { ?obra wdt:P186 ?material_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?material_), 32 ) AS ?material_qid) } OPTIONAL { ?obra wdt:P88 ?encomendador_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?encomendador_), 32 ) AS ?encomendador_qid) } OPTIONAL { ?category_ schema:about ?obra; schema:isPartOf <https://commons.wikimedia.org/>. BIND(wikibase:decodeUri(SUBSTR(STR(?category_), 36 )) AS ?category) } OPTIONAL { ?obra p:P2048 ?altura_aux.  OPTIONAL {?altura_aux pq:P518 ?aplica_a.} FILTER(?aplica_a!=wd:Q860792||!BOUND(?aplica_a)) ?altura_aux psv:P2048 ?altura_psv. ?altura_psv wikibase:quantityAmount ?altura_. ?altura_psv wikibase:quantityUnit ?unit_a_. ?unit_a_ wdt:P1813 ?unit_a. ?obra p:P2049 ?largura_aux. OPTIONAL {?largura_aux pq:P518 ?aplica_l.} FILTER(?aplica_l!=wd:Q860792||!BOUND(?aplica_l)) ?largura_aux psv:P2049 ?largura_psv. ?largura_psv wikibase:quantityAmount ?largura_. ?largura_psv wikibase:quantityUnit ?unit_l_. ?unit_l_ wdt:P1813 ?unit_l. } OPTIONAL { ?obra wdt:P2079 ?metodo_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?metodo_), 32 ) AS ?metodo_qid) } OPTIONAL { ?obra wdt:P217 ?numero_de_inventario. } OPTIONAL { ?obra wdt:P195 ?colecao_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?colecao_), 32 ) AS ?colecao_qid) } } GROUP BY ?obra ?obra_label ?obra_descr ?category ?numero_de_inventario

Motivos.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?retrata_stat_id ?retrata_qid ?retrata_label ?retrata_descr WHERE { BIND(wd:QIDDAOBRA AS ?item) SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "LANGUAGE,pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de". ?retrata rdfs:label ?retrata_label; schema:description ?retrata_descr.} OPTIONAL {?item p:P180 ?retrata_aux. ?retrata_aux ps:P180 ?retrata_. OPTIONAL {?retrata_aux pq:P3831 ?hasfunction} BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?retrata_aux), 42 ) AS ?retrata_stat_id) BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?retrata_), 32 ) AS ?retrata_qid) BIND(IF(ISBLANK(?retrata_), IF("LANGUAGE" = "en", "unknown motif", "motivo desconhecido"), ?retrata_) AS ?retrata) } } ORDER BY DESC(?hasfunction)

Next_qid.query: SELECT ?obra_next_qid WHERE { BIND(wd:QIDDAOBRA AS ?obra) ?obra wdt:P31 ?instancia. ?obra_next wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470; wdt:P18 []; wdt:P31 ?instancia; schema:dateModified ?date_modified. FILTER(?obra_next!=?obra) BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?obra_next),32) AS ?obra_next_qid) } ORDER BY ASC(?date_modified) LIMIT 50
